pages.text: It looks red-hot, as if it were on fire, burning like hell to the touch (you _had_ to satisfy your curiosity...) and yet radiates no heat at all.\While $(l:magical_blocks/midnight_solution)Midnight Solution$() seems to be destructive for the sake of change, Dragonrot seems intent only on pure and total destruction. Certainly there is not much organic that can withstand its bloodlust.

pages.title: Item Conversion
pages.text: Throwing in some items seems to corrupt them up to a point they turn into something else entirely.
